name: Impact / Effort Matrix
description:
Generate ideas, solutions, features and evaluate them by Impact and Effort.


This simple 2 x 2 Matrix helps you and your team map out ideas by their potential impact and potential effort of implementation. Some ideas are more costly then others, but might have a more long-term payoff, than any low hanging fruit and short-term actions.


Categorizing ideas visually and collaboratively is a useful technique in alignment and decision making, and forces you to evaluate and pit potential ideas, solutions, and actions against each other. 


Happy Jamming ❤️
